PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... exhort v 力劝（人去做） hortatory a 劝告的，忠告的 hospital n 医院（客气对待病人的地方）.
scrimp的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... propagation 增殖, 繁殖, 宣传 ... hortatory 激励的... craving 渴望, 热望.
词根及词缀 ... exhort v 力劝（人去做） hortatory a 劝告的，忠告的 hospital n 医院（客气对待病人的地方）.
而选择使用劝告性(hortatory)〝请求〞(calls on)用语，尽管被解讀是援引宪

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin hortatorius, from hortari 'exhort'

auth_sentence.content: The vocabulary...appears couched imperatively and in a hortatory tone.

auth_sentence.content: Ultimately, the reductivism and hortatory optimism of Maoism proved too much.

auth_sentence.content: The conservative scholar James Q. Wilson called it bland, vague, hortatory and lacking in substance.

stems_affixes.word_buile: hort鼓励+atory表形容词→adj.劝告的, 激励的
de去,不+hort鼓励→不鼓励别人做→劝阻
